item.title: C Programming Language
item.description:
The C Programming Language is the best textbook for a beginner who wants to learn C. This article mostly talks about pointers and memory in C. C’s syntax is simple but handling pointers in C is too easy to get stuck. Primitive data types and sizes char, int, float, double signed, unsigned, short, long constant 1 2 3 printf("%u
", sizeof(int)); printf("%u
", sizeof(char)); printf("%u
", sizeof(float)); Array Array is a continuous fixed-length address.
